    type CounterProps = {
        count?: number
    }
    
    export function Counter({ count = 0 }: CounterProps) {
        const [cnt, setCnt] = null as any;
              ~~~~~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS6198: All destructured elements are unused.
        return <>
            <p>{cnt}</p>
            <button onClick={() => setCnt((prev) => prev + 1)} type="button">Update</button>
        </>
